about.title: Who am I?
about.paragraph1: Trained in Germany over twenty years ago, I have always perceived naturopathy as an art of uniting body, energy, and consciousness. Over time, my practice has opened up to vibratory healing, meditation, and an inner approach to care, where listening becomes an act of healing and awakening.
about.paragraph2: I accompany each person at their own pace, in a caring space where the body finds its natural intelligence, the heart its clarity, and the soul its alignment.
about.paragraph3: My practice also includes a meditation space, a place of renewal and sharing, where I occasionally welcome small groups for guided practices and experiences of reconnecting with oneself. I look forward to welcoming you and accompanying you towards a state of presence, harmony, and inner vitality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our treatments and practices.

questions.question: What is ChromoBioEnergy?
questions.answer: ChromoBioEnergy is a therapeutic method that uses colors and their vibrational frequencies to harmonize body and mind. Developed by Evelyne Monsallier, it allows the detection and correction of energetic imbalances through chromoemotional tests.

questions.question: How does a Reiki session work?
questions.answer: A Reiki session typically lasts between 60 and 90 minutes. You lie down, clothed, in a calm environment. The practitioner places their hands on or above different parts of your body to channel universal energy. The session promotes deep relaxation and the release of energy blockages.

questions.question: Are vibratory treatments compatible with medical treatment?
questions.answer: Yes, vibratory treatments are complementary and do not replace medical treatment. They can be practiced alongside conventional medicine to support the body's natural healing process.

questions.question: Is special preparation required before a session?
questions.answer: It is recommended to wear comfortable clothing and avoid heavy meals just before the session. Come with an open and available mind to receive healing energies.

questions.question: How many sessions are needed?
questions.answer: The number of sessions varies according to individual needs and desired goals. Some people feel benefits from the first session, while others prefer support over several weeks. We discuss together the best program for you.

questions.question: Do you offer group sessions for meditation?
questions.answer: Yes, my practice includes a meditation space where I occasionally welcome small groups for guided practices and experiences of reconnection with oneself.

reiki.title: Reiki
reiki.description: Reiki is a Japanese energy therapy that uses universal life energy to promote physical, emotional, mental and spiritual healing. During a session, the practitioner places their hands on or above the receiver's body to channel this energy, eliminate blockages and restore harmony.

vibratory.title: Vibratory Healing
vibratory.description: Vibratory healing offers a holistic approach using sound, light and energy vibrations to balance body, mind and soul. Based on universal frequencies, these techniques including singing bowls, mantras and chromobioenergy reduce stress, improve sleep, relieve pain and increase energy.
benefits: Personalized session according to your needs

meditation.title: Meditation
meditation.description: Meditation uses various techniques such as mindfulness, guided and transcendental meditation, as well as mantras like the OM sound, to promote relaxation, self-awareness and emotional healing. It reduces stress, anxiety and depression, improves concentration and mental clarity, and promotes inner peace.
benefits: Reduction of stress, anxiety and depression

chromobio.title: ChromoBioEnergy
chromobio.description: ChromoBioEnergy uses color as mysterious music to reharmonize our body and mind. Each person is born with a unique capital of colors, and this method, adapted to individual needs, treats various imbalances. Thanks to the chromoemotional tests developed by Evelyne Monsallier, the dissonances of your inner melody are detected and corrected.
